manifesto.title: The Builders Manifesto
manifesto.motto: Transcending the Grid, Archiving the Infinite.
manifesto.body:
In the vast digital expanse of Second Life, we found more than pixels; we found a frontier. Since 2025, the Gate Builders collective has stood as a beacon for those who believe that virtual worlds are not just games, but extensions of human creativity and social evolution.
Our mission is simple yet profound: to build, to connect, and to preserve. We believe in the power of open protocols, the beauty of optimized architecture, and the necessity of community-driven governance. We are the architects of the Stargate networkâ€”a series of interconnected experiences that defy the boundaries of individual regions.
We strive for technical excellence. Every line of LSL, every triangle in a mesh, every event coordinated is a testament to our dedication to a high-fidelity future. We are not just building structures; we are building a universe.
Join us as we continue to push the boundaries of what is possible within the virtual realm. The gate is open. The future is built by us.
